title: Starts of the Week + Week 13 Breakdown, Boom Boom Resumes - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/2
description:
It’s football time! Week 13 is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason dive into Week 13 matchups and reveal their Starts of the Week! Plus, injury updates, a new edition of “Never Not Working," and the Boom Boom story continues! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 2nd, 2021.
  
 (07:10) - Never Not Working
 (14:00) - NFL News
 (27:15) - Fantasy Forecast
 (27:30) - Buccaneers at Falcons
 (32:55) - Cardinals at Bears
 (39:25) - Chargers at Bengals
 (44:50) - Vikings at Lions
 (50:35) - Giants at Dolphins
 (55:50) - Starts of the Week
 (56:00) - QB Starts of the Week 
 (58:15) - RB Starts of the Week 
 (01:00:05) - WR Starts of the Week
 (01:02:20) - TE Starts of the Week
 (01:03:50) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
